text: My son has had a wonderful experience at Kinderland Hougang! The teachers are incredibly nurturing, patient, and dedicated to the children’s growth and development. The school provides a warm and stimulating environment where learning is fun and interactive. We’ve seen tremendous progress in my son’s confidence, social skills, and enthusiasm for learning. Highly recommend Kinderland Hougang to any parent looking for a fantastic preschool!

My son has been attending Kinderland Hougang for a number of years and I am truly impressed with how dedicated, passionate and caring the teachers are. The preparation for primary school is elaborate as well. Absolutely no regrets choosing this preschool and would recommend Kinderland Hougang to parents living in the vicinity.

My son attended this preschool and we have a very good experience with the Centre Head and Teachers. They are very professional, dedicated and responsive to our queries. I see growth and positive development in my son over the years. Thank you Teachers! Highly recommend :)

My kid just graduated last year, and was at Kinderland Hougang for most of his preschool years. He enjoyed his time there very much. Special thanks to all the teachers and staff, especially Tang laoshi, Ms Meixian, Xu laoshi, Chen laoshi and Ms Stella who taught him and took great care of him during his years there.

He says: Thank you for all the help and care. :)

Excellent teachers in a nurturing environment!
Love all the teachers there who teach with passions!
Special shout out to Ms Tng, Ms Meixian, 许老师 who taught my son during his time in preschool.
